label: water
caption: A young boy, dressed in a bright orange swimsuit, sits on top of a large, circular fountain, his legs dangling into the calm water below. Water shoots up from the fountain's center, creating a soothing mist that rises high into the air on this warm summer day. A few children playfully run around the edge of the fountain, laughing and trying to catch the droplets of water as they fall back down onto the surrounding pavement.
